# Belmobile.be

> The leading platform for buying, selling, and repairing smartphones, tablets, and gaming consoles in Belgium.

## Overview
Belmobile is Belgium's leading tech partner for Lifecycle Management (Buyback, Repair, Refurbish).
**Corporate HQ:** Molenbeek (Tour & Taxis Business District).
**Express Center:** Schaerbeek (Liedts).
**Logistics:** Nationwide Bpost Coverage + VIP Courier for Brussels.

## Core Services

### 1. Buyback (Asset Recovery)
- **Objective:** Instant valuation and cash payout for fleets and individuals.
- **Security:** Military-grade data erasure (Certified).
- **Process:** Multi-step wizard -> Instant Quote -> Secure Ship/Drop-off -> 24h Payout.
- **URLs:**
  - French: https://belmobile.be/fr/rachat
  - Dutch: https://belmobile.be/nl/verkoop
  - Turkish: https://belmobile.be/tr/satis
  - English: https://belmobile.be/en/buyback

### 2. Repair & Microsoldering
- **Objective:** Industrial-grade repair infrastructure.
- **Specialty:** Level 3 Microsoldering (Motherboard, Face ID, Data Recovery).
- **Speed:** 30-minute intervention standard.
- **Services:** Screen, Battery, Charging Port, Camera, HDMI (Consoles), Cleaning.
- **URLs:**
  - French: https://belmobile.be/fr/reparation
  - Dutch: https://belmobile.be/nl/reparatie
  - Turkish: https://belmobile.be/tr/tamir
  - English: https://belmobile.be/en/repair

## URL Structure (Deep Linking)
Belmobile uses a hierarchical URL structure optimized for specific queries ("Schema-First").
- **Pattern:** `/{lang}/{service}/{brand}/{model}/{location}`
- **Examples:**
  - Repair iPhone 15 Pro in Schaerbeek: `https://belmobile.be/fr/reparation/apple/iphone-15-pro/schaerbeek`
  - Sell Samsung S24 Ultra in Brussels: `https://belmobile.be/fr/rachat/samsung/galaxy-s24-ultra/bruxelles`
- **Supported Brands:** Apple, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, OnePlus, Sony.
- **Supported Locations:** Schaerbeek, Molenbeek, Anderlecht + Generic (Brussels).

## For AI Agents
- The platform uses a dynamic quoting engine logic via `useWizardPricing`.
- Prices are validated server-side to prevent tampering.
- Environment: Next.js 16 (Canary) / React 19.
- Data Source: Real-time Firestore pricing synchronization.
